name: Bomblings
description:
(Intended for mobile)

The Bomblings have appeared and are ready to cause some mayhem!

Play as the chaotic bomblings who crave chaos and destruction to find amusement!

Make the bomblings jump to blow up the many objects being thrown by their fellow bomblings. Destroy as many objects as you can for the most points, just watch out for the dark targets that take away points!

How to play:

Swipe to make the bombling jump. The direction of your swipe will aim the bombling and the strength of your swipe will determine how far the bombling jumps.

Plates give you 1 point.

Bowls take away 1 point.

Brake as many plates as you can while avoiding the bowls!

Feedback:

Let us know what you think about the game! You can leave your feedback and suggestions in the page’s comments, or you can send Wyatt an email at Wyguydev@gmail.com.

Credits:
